```{r}
library(BasketballAnalyzeR)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tm <- c("NYK", "LAL", "OKC", "MIA")
selTeams <- which(Tadd$team %in% tm)
FF.sel <- fourfactors(Tbox[selTeams,], Obox[selTeams,])
FF.sel
```

```{r}
plot(FF.sel)
```

```{r}
radialprofile(data = FF.sel %>% select(-Team), title=FF.sel$Team, std=T)
```

```{r}
Pbox.Team <- Pbox %>% filter(Team == "New York Knicks" |
                             Team == "Los Angeles Lakers" |
                             Team == "Oklahoma City Thunder" |
                             Team == "Miami Heat")
Pbox.Team %>% transmute(P2M=P2M/MIN, P3M=P3M/MIN, FTM=FTM/MIN,
REB=(OREB+DREB)/MIN, AST=AST/MIN, STL=STL/MIN, BLK=BLK/MIN) -> X

X

radialprofile(data=X, title=Pbox.Team$Player, std=F)
```
